restaurantText: Korean Tofu House has the best side dishes!!! And the dishes all taste so good! It's my go-to place when I feel like eating Korean food.
The BoB have very good side dishes as well, but the wait time there is a bit longer. I LOVE their spicy pork bone soup and bibimbap!

The fried chicken at Chi Mac is THE BEST!!! I absolutely love the snow flavor, other flavors are good too! Their fried rice and cheese corn are also very delicious. Also love their radish that goes with the chicken!
Kong Tofu House is very affordable and tastes okay, I want to try all of their menu.
Very tasty, quick, and affordable bowls of yummy broth and noodles!
The rice bowls and sandwiches are so flavorful. A great quick and filling bite between classes
This is a classic 2am eats! Greasy, meaty, yet filling; this place is a great way to satisfy the munchies on a night out
This place does not beat Aladdin's but it is a close one! Definetly a great place with filling gyro plates
Their mango sticky rice is a perfect way to end a delicious meal of spices and flavors!
A yummy, and recently new place that opened up the past year or so. Give it a try some time!
Bouncy, chewy, fresh noodles covered with sauces and soups so tasty and so good!!
A nice sit down place for a larger group to enjoy multitude of different dishes!
Convenient, customizable, and comforting food! Find a filling bowl of noodles and soup fitting to your taste and mood
This place give full servings! It wont be sure to disapoint with all the yummy options
